title: "Replication Collection"
---

This is an automatic collection of replication research based on the FORRT Replication Database. Please note that these articles have not necessarily been peer-reviewed or published by Replication Research. This collection serves as a way to make replication research across disciplines visible. To add a replication, please use [this Google form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeMCwdtP0TPgL55stniuyyTxnNwyC34mO4VUuLcQwYrLI89sQ/viewform) and send an e-mail to lukas.roeseler\[at\]uni-muenster.de.
